item.title: House of Cards from the House of Lords
item.author: Alexander Morton,Diana Lucaci,
item.description: How has your life changed as a result of writing House of Cards? It totally… I wrote it as an accident. I wrote it as a result of a bet. Actually, I didn’t even write it as a bet, I was challenged on a holiday to see if I could write a book and I was really bored and had nothing else to do on …
